note.p: Education: Magdalene College, Cambridge (admitted 1665); Middle Temple (admitted 1666)
Career: Sold his estate at Tofts to his brother, Francis; Ensign in the Duke of Buckingham's Regiment (1673)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Venn; Le Neve; MT; Dalton
References: Michael Hunter, 'The Social Bias and Changing Fortunes of an Early Scientific Institution: An Analysis of the Membership of the Royal Society, 1660-1685' in NR 1976-7 vol 31 pp 9-114
